author: Eric Song
description: You can never have too many charging ports and outlets.
title: This Baseus Charging Station Adds Three USB Ports and Three AC Outlets for Only $12

author: Michael Higham
description: The Asus ROG Pelta is a versatile wireless gaming headset with little to complain about and plenty to enjoy like solid audio, comfort, and connectivity options.
title: Asus ROG Pelta Gaming Headset Review – An Easy Mid-Range Recommendation

author: Michael Cripe
description: Severance star Tramell Tillman will reportedly make his MCU debut in Spider-Man: Brand New Day in an unnamed role.
title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day Adds Severance Star Tramell Tillman to Its Cast

author: Eric Song
description: About as thin as an iPhone 16.
title: The Exceptionally Slim Lisen 5,000Mah Wireless Magnetic Power Bank Drops to Under $15

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: There's been lots of excitement over the presence of a Hollow Knight: Silksong game demo on the show floor at Gamescom this year. But Silksong fans hoping for new content in this demo might be a little disappointed, because the Gamescom demo is the same demo from six years ago at E3 2019, but shinier.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Demo at Gamescom 2025 Is a Shinier, Silkier Version of the Same Demo From E3 2019

author: Eric Song
description: Lenovo's most powerful gaming PC is only available at Lenovo direct.
title: The Rare Lenovo Legion 7 RTX 5090 Gaming PC Is in Stock (And on Sale) at Lenovo Direct

author: Wes Davis
description: Google has officially announced the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro and Pro XL, and a truly dustproof foldable, the Pixel 10 Pro Fold phone. Unsurprisingly, the announcement was all about AI features, including the ability to turn your photos into videos, built right into the phone, all presented during Made by Google today.
title: Google Announces the Pixel 10 Lineup, With More AI and Magnetic Charging

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Halloween revealed by Friday the 13th: The Game Developer. Check out IGN's interview with IllFonic on the single-player story mode, working with John Carpenter, and more.
title: Halloween Revealed by Friday the 13th: The Game Developer — IGN Interviews IllFonic on the Single-Player Story Mode, Working With John Carpenter, and More

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Nonetheless, there is one clear evolution here over previous Anno games. Anno 1800 and the futuristic Anno 2205 treated your colonies as secondary concerns—settlements whose purpose was to support your primary metropolis. In Anno 117, building settlements in Latium and Albion will be equally involved.
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana – The Final Preview

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: A new bundle has appeared.
title: Disney+ Launches New ESPN Unlimited Bundle, Special Offer Makes Hulu Free for First 12 Months

author: Michael Cripe
description: Square Enix just shadow dropped Triangle Strategy for PS5 and Xbox Series X | S, with a discount for anyone who picks up a copy in the next two weeks.
title: Triangle Strategy Shadow Drops for PS5 and Xbox With Limited-Time Discount

author: Kevin Lee
description: If you're looking to jump-start your streaming career, these are the best capture cards.
title: The Best Capture Cards in 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Phil Lord and Christopher Miller, the famous filmmaking pair known for Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs, The Lego Movie, 21 Jump Street, The Mitchells vs. the Machines, and the Spider-Verse films, are about to tackle a new, unexpected project. They're making a film based on Archie comics.
title: Spider-Verse Filmmakers Lord and Miller Are Making an Archie Comics Movie

author: Eric Song
description: Say goodbye to buying compressed air canisters in bulk.
title: Get a Cordless Rechargeable Electric Air Duster for Your PC for Just $25 After Amazon Coupon

author: Christian Wait
description: As of August 20, Amazon has dropped the Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy Commander Deck bundle to $189.99 (29% off), alongside big savings on the TMNT Trilogy Blu-ray, Bookoo Jump Starter, Apple 20W USB-C Charger, tomtoc Switch 2 Case, EUKI Air Duster, and the INIU Portable Charger.
title: The Best Deals Today: Ridiculously Cheap Portable Chargers For Phones And Cars

author: Michael Cripe
description: Paramount is currently streaming Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning on its YouTube channel…in Morse Code.
title: Paramount Is Streaming Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning on YouTube But It's All in Morse Code

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: New Pixel phones are releasing on August 28.
title: Amazon Has the Best Google Pixel 10 Deals When You Preorder the New Phones

author: Michael Cripe
description: Squanch Games has announced a release date for High on Life 2 that will see its first-person shooter comedy sequel launch February 13, 2026.
title: High on Life 2 Release Date Reveals Delay to February 2026

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Infinity Nikki is getting some sort of crossover collaboration with Stardew Valley beginning September 1, and there are already some surprisingly mixed reactions coming from the community in the wake of the announcement thanks to five months of community frustration directed at Infinity Nikki's developer, Infold.
title: Infinity Nikki Is Getting a Stardew Valley Collab in September, But Not Everyone Is Happy About It

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: IGN is partnering with gamescom to present a brand-new Humble Bundle that, for at least $18, will get you a collection of seven games worth $214, including Homeworld 3, Bomb Rush Cyberfunk, and more. Furthermore, your purchase will go a long way in helping DonorsChoose, a charity that helps teachers get the supplies they need to help their students succeed.
title: IGN x gamescom 2025 Humble Bundle Announced With Homeworld 3, Bomb Rush Cyberfunk, and More

author: Eric Song
description: Nintendo recently raised the retail price from $85 to $90.
title: Get a Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller (Import Model) at a Discounted Price From AliExpress

author: coreydemoss
title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin Shows New Trailer at gamescom, Sign-Ups for Closed Beta Test Begin

author: Michael Cripe
description: It looks like South Park is bringing back Towelie to take another jab at President Donald Trump as Season 27 of the Comedy Central show rolls on.
title: South Park Season 27 Episode 3 Trailer Sees Towelie Return for a Trip to Washington D.C.

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: I certainly wasn't expecting a new Dawn of War any time soon, much less from a studio other than Relic. But from the bit of it I've played, it seems like King Art Games understands the assignment. As a Dawn of War 2 fan, I miss the emphasis on cover and move-and-fire tactics. But Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 has nevertheless made a big first impression.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 – First Impressions From a Series Veteran

author: Chris Reed
description: All models of PS5 are getting a price increase, starting August 21. This may be your last chance in a long time to get one at today's prices.
title: Today Is the Last Day to Buy a New PS5 Before Prices Increase

author: Meg Koepp
description: IGN's Hollow Knight interactive map includes locations for Grubs, Benches, Stag Stations, Charms, and more.
title: Hollow Knight Interactive Map is Now Available

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Indie climbing hit Peak has officially sold 10 million copies according to Aliena Analytics analyst Rhys Elliott and Gamescom Opening Night Live host Geoff Keighley.
title: Peak Sells 10 Million Copies

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Last of Us Season 3 will be longer than Season 2 when it eventually premieres on HBO, according to showrunner and series co-creator Craig Mazin.
title: The Last of Us Season 3 'Will Be Longer' Than Season 2, Showrunner Confirms

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sony has announced price rises for the PlayStation 5, PlayStation 5 Digital Edition and PlayStation 5 Pro that will go into effect within the U.S. tomorrow, August 21.
title: Sony Announces PlayStation 5 Price Rises for U.S.

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Have you played the critically acclaimed MMORPG Final Fantasy 14? What's that, you haven't? You only have Nintendo platforms and nothing else? Well, never fear, because Final Fantasy 14 producer Naoki 'Yoshi-P' Yoshida is thinking of you.
title: Final Fantasy 14's Yoshi-P Says There May Be 'Good News' in the Future About FF14 on Nintendo Switch 2

author: Michael Cripe
description: Deep Silver and Warhorse Studios showed up for gamescom Opening Night Live 2025 to announce a release date for the next Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 story DLC, Legacy of the Forge.
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Legacy of the Forge DLC Trailer Reveals September Release Date and Henry's New Home

author: coreydemoss
title: Retro-Inspired Action RPG Shrine’s Legacy Gets Official Release Date

author: Wes Davis
title: Asus Confirms the ROG Xbox Ally X Will Launch in October

author: Tom Phillips
description: Microsoft has confirmed release date and availability details for the ROG Xbox Ally X, its upcoming gaming handheld made by Asus, but notably held off on confirming how much the device will cost.
title: Microsoft Still Can't Say How Much the ROG Xbox Ally X Will Cost Due to "Macro-Economic" Conditions, Despite Announcing Release Date and Availability Details

author: Tom Phillips
description: With a release date now announced for Asus' ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X devices, fan attention now turns to Microsoft's own plans to make a handheld Xbox. And today, at Gamescom, we checked in for an update.
title: Xbox Hardware Boss Says 'Who Knows What the Future Entails' Following Report Company Had Sidelined First-Party Handheld Plans

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Co-op is nothing new to LEGO games, certainly, but LEGO Voyagers removes the “optional” from the co-op, and strips any big-IP license away as well. We’re left with a game that combines puzzles and platforming and puts it in a compelling co-op package.
title: LEGO Voyagers Might Already Be My Favorite LEGO Game Ever

author: Simon Cardy
description: After a long, long time we finally got our hands on Team Cherry's Hollow Knight: Silksong. Here's what we thought.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - We Played It! | gamescom 2025

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: So far, The Blood of Dawnwalker captures that feeling of navigating two different worlds as a half-vampire, which is a very compelling premise for a role-playing game.
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker Offers 2 Very Different RPG Playstyles

author: Matt Purslow
description: Onimusha: Way of the Sword is shaping up to be a sharp, skilful return for Capcom's long-slumbering series.
title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword Skilfully Sharpens a PS2 Classic for a New Generation | Gamescom 2025

author: Matt Purslow
description: Pragmata's hack-and-blast spin on traditional shooting is one of Capcom's most interesting ideas in years, but not everything in its latest demo feels quite so smart.
title: Pragmata Aims to Break the Rules of Third-Person Shooters | gamescom 2025

author: Dale Driver
description: Resident Evil Requiem has a new, terrifying foe that more than lives up to the mantle of a Resident Evil stalker.
title: Resident Evil Requiem Hands-On Preview

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: The most interesting part of our Project Spectrum demo came when a powerful multi-armed creature suddenly popped out of nowhere and started hunting the players, and it was revealed to be controlled by another human.
title: Project Spectrum Is Looking Extremely Weird and More Than a Little Creepy

author: Wes Davis
title: Hyperkin’s DualSense-Style Xbox Controller is Coming in October

author: Ryan McCaffrey
title: Kirby Air Riders – The First Preview

author: Eric Song
description: Don't miss out on the best - and potentially only - Nintendo Switch 2 deal of the year.
title: Save Up to $60 Off the Nintendo Switch 2 Console by Getting a Genuine Import Model From AliExpress

author: Clint Gage
description: Alien: Earth spends maybe one episode too many setting the stakes for the rest of the season, but, man, are they great stakes.
title: Alien: Earth Episode 3 Review

author: Adam Mathew
description: Today's bargains line-up spans inventive indies, glossy blockbusters, and a few experimental oddballs that prove risk-taking still has a place in game development.
title: AU Deals: Big Hits, Bigger Discounts – The PS5, Switch & LEGO Must-Buys of Today

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: After three episodes of Alien: Earth, it's clear the series is ignoring the established history of the Xenomorph. Here's why you shouldn't care.
title: Upset That Alien: Earth Completely Reinvents the Xenomorph's Mythology? Get Over It

author: Eric Song
description: The Tomtoc Slim is less expensive than the official Switch case, even though it's a lot nicer.
title: One of the Best Nintendo Switch 2 Cases Drops to the Lowest Price Ever on Amazon

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: While other characters and conflicts are glimpsed in the new trailer for Fallout: Season 2, it’s the literal journey of Walton Goggins’ Cooper Howard, aka The Ghoul, that serves as the teaser’s narrative throughline. In the trailer, The Ghoul’s arrival in New Vegas triggers the backstory of how Coop went to Las Vegas before the war, where he met with the man who he claims was the main cause of the end of the world: Robert House.
title: Fallout: Season 2 Trailer Ties The Ghoul's Origin Story to Mr. House
